name: RTYPE
description:
Record Type: D=District, S=School, 
                    M=Small, F=Direct Funded Charter, A=ASAM, B=ASAM and Small

name: STYPE
description:
Type: 1=Unified, 2=Elementary District, 
                    3=9-12 High District, 4=7-12 High District, E=Elementary School, 
                    M=Middle School, H=High School

name: VALID
description: Number of Scores included in the 2004 API

name: API03
description:
2003 API (Base) (C=School did 
                    not have a valid 2003 API Base and there is no Growth or target 
                    information,)

name: TARGET
description:
2003–2004 Growth Target, "A," "D," 
                    "E," or "F" (A=Met Interim Performance Target 
                    of 800. D=School had significant demographic changes and 
                    there is no Growth or target information E=There is no growth 
                    target for Districts and ASAM schools F=School was an Alternative 
                    Schools Accountability Model (ASAM) school in the API Base 
                    report and has no target information even though the school 
                    is no longer an ASAM school)

name: GROWTH
description:
2003–2004 API Growth (D=School 
                    had significant demographic changes and there is no Growth 
                    information.)

name: AA_NUM
description:
Number of African Americans Included 
                    in API

name: AA_MET
description:
Met African American Subgroup Growth 
                    Target

name: AI_NUM
description:
Number of American Indians Included 
                    in API

name: AI_MET
description:
Met American Indians Subgroup Growth 
                    Target

name: AS_NUM
description: Number of Asians Included in API

name: FI_NUM
description:
Number of Filipinos Included in 
                    API

name: HI_NUM
description:
Number of Hispanics included in 
                    API

name: PI_NUM
description:
Number of Pacific Islanders Included 
                    in API

name: PI_MET
description:
Met Pacific Islander Subgroup Growth 
                    Target

name: WH_NUM
description: Number of whites included in API

name: SD_NUM
description:
Number of Socioeconomically Disadvantaged 
                    (SD) Students Included in API

name: SD_MET
description:
Met Socioeconomically Disadvantaged 
                    Subgroup Growth Target

name: MEALS
description:
Percentage of Students Tested that 
                    are Participants in the Free or Reduced Price Meal Program

name: SMOB
description:
Percentage of Students Who First 
                    Attended this School in the Present Year

name: CBMOB
description:
Percentage of Students counted as part of school 
                    enrollment in October 2003 CBEDS and has been continuously 
                    enrolled since that date

name: DMOB
description:
Percentage of Students counted 
                    as part of district enrollment in October 2003 CBEDS and has 
                    been continuously enrolled since that date

name: ACS_CORE
description:
Average Class Size for a Number 
                    of Core Academic Courses

name: PCT_RESP
description:
Percent of Student Answer Documents 
                    with Parent Education Level Information

name: NOT_HSG
description:
Parent Ed Level: Percent Not High School 
                    Graduate

name: HSG
description: Parent Ed Level: Percent High School Graduate

name: SOME_COL
description: Parent Ed Level: Percent Some College

name: COL_GRAD
description:
Parent Ed Level: Percent College 
                    Graduate

name: GRAD_SCH
description:
Parent Ed Level: Percent Graduate 
                    School

name: FULL
description:
Percent Teachers at this School 
                    with Full Credentials

name: EMER
description:
Percent Teachers at this school 
                    with Emergency Credentials

name: ENROLL
description:
Number of Students Enrolled on 
                    the First Day of Testing for Grades 2-11

name: CAPA
description:
Number of Students Excused from 
                    Testing by Individualized Education Program Statement

name: PARENT_OPT
description:
Number of Students Excused from 
                    Testing by Parental Written Request

name: MEDIAN04
description:
Median score of this school's similar 
                    schools group for 2004 Growth API

name: MEDIAN03
description:
Median score of this school's similar 
                    schools group for 2003 Base API
